metadata.title: CVE-2015-3248 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: openhpi/Makefile.am in OpenHPI before 3.6.0 uses world-writable permissionsfor /var/lib/openhpi directory, which allows local users, when quotas arenot properly setup, to fill the filesystem hosting /var/lib and cause adenial of service (disk consumption).

criterions.comment: openhpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
